text: The Optare MetroRider is a step-entrance midibus that was built by Optare between 1989 and 2000. == History == It was made in November 1989, One thousand one hundred fifty-nine MetroRiders were made. ==Electric version== An electric version of the MetroRider was made in 1993. ==Natural gas version== A natural gas version was made in 1995. == Related pages == * List of bus models ==References== == Other websites == MetroRider Category:Midibuses Category:Battery electric buses
title: Optare MetroRider
